name: Vampe - Catch me... if you can!
name_original: Vampe - Catch me... if you can!
description:
Welcome to Vampe,

Test your skill and reflexes in this fast paced runner with endless levels.

-Avoid the zombies and traps,

-Collect  the runes  ( in the right order to get extra speed).

-Go to the exit and start a new level.

Keys: Cursor,WASD or gamepad. F-toggles fullscreen.

by Valdir.
